name: Victor Wembanyama
description: 7'4" center from France, 'The Alien'. Unprecedented combination of height, wingspan (8'0"), skill, and mobility. Generational prospect, humble prodigy.

rim-protection.name: The Tower
rim-protection.prompt: standing at rim with arms extended upward - impossibly long limbs creating a wall, shots altered just by his presence, the tower that changes everything

three-point-stroke.name: 7'4" Shooter
three-point-stroke.prompt: releasing three-pointer over helpless defender - ball at apex of impossibly high release point, smooth stroke, the big man who shoots like a guard

handle-moves.name: Guard Skills
handle-moves.description: Handling ball like a point guard
handle-moves.prompt: crossing over at 7'4" - ball on a string despite massive frame, defender stumbling, the alien doing things his size shouldn't allow

humble-prodigy.name: Humble Giant
humble-prodigy.prompt: slight smile, humble posture despite towering height - the prodigy who remains grounded, genuine and unaffected by the hype

chase-down.name: Chase Down
chase-down.prompt: chasing down fast break from behind - impossibly long strides covering court, about to erase what looked like easy layup, casual dominance

finger-roll.name: Touch at the Rim
finger-roll.prompt: releasing delicate finger roll over defender - massive hand but softest touch, the skill that defies his size, artistry from a giant
